name: onedrive-export-admins
title: Export OneDrive Admins
shortDescription: Exports every OneDrive in the tenant, and the site collection admins. Audit which admins have access to user OneDrives.
longDescription: This script exports every OneDrive in the tenant, and the site collection admins of the site. This helps audit which admins have unnecessary access to user OneDrives.

thumbnails.alt: Preview of the sample Export OneDrive Admins

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
